name: Camouflage (BSmith156)
description:
This is Camouflage, a challenging game to test your platforming skills as well as your memory! Can you beat all the levels and unlock hard mode?

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move, R to restart, and ESC to exit. 

This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 62: Colors.

Either play it directly in the browser or download a standalone version below!
